meta.description: Determine the maximum data flow from Data Center 0 to Data Center 7 in a high-speed data network.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Maximum data flow capacity between data centers in Tbps

vars.name: flow
vars.description: Flow of data in Tbps from one data center to another

vars.name: F
vars.description: Total flow from source to destination in Tbps

objective.name: maximize_total_flow
objective.description: Maximize the total data flow from Data Center 0 to Data Center 7

constraints.name: source_flow_balance
constraints.description: Flow balance at the source data center 0

constraints.name: sink_flow_balance
constraints.description: Flow balance at the sink data center 7

constraints.name: flow_conservation_1
constraints.description: Flow conservation at data center 1

constraints.name: flow_conservation_2
constraints.description: Flow conservation at data center 2

constraints.name: flow_conservation_6
constraints.description: Flow conservation at data center 6
